channel.title: How is Axoloti.exe generated?
channel.description:
I'm not sure where to look in the codebase, so could anyone kindly advise how Axoloti.exe is generated on Windows? I ask because it seems related to a crashing issue documented here: http://community.axoloti.com/t/axoloti-patcher-crashes-to-desktop-on-invoking-file-dialog/3880/2
cheers and keep writing noise-making code!

item.title: How is Axoloti.exe generated?
item.dc:creator: @thetechnobear Mark Harris
item.description:
@thetechnobear wrote:

make deploy
we use javafx to wrap the jar and we have ever since version 1.0.0, without issue

ive just responded to the other thread, as mentioned there, it works perfectly fine on my windows 10 64 bit laptop, so the issue needs to be drilled down a bit more.
(quite a few Axoloti users are running win 10, so if only 2-3 users report such a 'serious issue', its likely its something a bit more subtle than just win10/64bit)

Read full topic
